blog.name: fangirlunderground
blog.title: Fangirl Underground
blog.description: Multi-Fandom Positivity // Twitter: fangirluground / Pillowfort & Dreamwidth: fangirlunderground / Discord: fangirlangela #2181 // (Angela, She/Her, 36)

title: Fic Rec Friday
body:
I have many ships, but Stony is my OTP in the truest sense of the term; my one true pair. I sometimes stray, but I always come back, and this week seemed like the right time to return. 

I started shipping Steve and Tony in 2006, thanks to Scans_Daily on LJ. I mean, how could I not after seeing Steve carry Tony out of a burning building, looking more like the cover of a Harlequin romance novel than a comic book? Or seeing Tony save Steve’s life with his own last breath and a dramatic lock of the lips? They were so different, in every possible way, but their love and respect for one other was palpable. Even in their lighter moments, like sharing sesame bagels or bickering over what to watch on TV, they felt like an old married couple. I was hooked. 

And it wasn’t just the ship I fell for, it was the fandom. I will always remember the excitement of searching through Tales of Suspense and the @cap-ironman​​ community to find some of the best fics I’ve ever read, even to this day; of looking at every last link on the Slashy Moments List and squeeing as Tony talked about Steve’s ‘handsome face’ and ‘azure eyes.’ (Yeah, that’s canon!)

Then the MCU happened, and despite their on-screen animosity, this fandom managed to create something beautiful and lasting, and so popular that it’s been a Top 10 ship on AO3 for at least as long as @centrumlumina​​​ has been reporting ship stats. Even the actors celebrate Stony! 

Even after all these years — and so many comics and movies and surprisingly gay mobile games — the core of the Stony ship is always that they’re better together than they are apart. No matter what forces, or franchises, tear them apart, it’s only ever temporary. And, when it takes too long, there’s always fandom to fix it. In that spirit, today’s fics are largely about Steve and Tony working through their problems and finding each other. (And, you know, some fluff and smut because they deserve it after all they’ve been through). 

As always, please let the authors know you appreciate their work by leaving kudos, comments, bookmarks, or maybe even following them on Tumblr and saying “hi.” I promise to keep it short and sweet next week!

Marvel - Steve/Tony

all warm-blooded creatures by @elcorhamletlive​, From a very early age, Steve Rogers was aware that he was going to die of cold. (Not Rated, 13k).

Any Road by @sheronwrites, Three months after defeating Thanos, Steve Rogers wakes up in the middle of a cornfield, with no memory of how he got there. No memories of anything, not even his own name. The only valuable on him is a flip-phone with a single contact number. Tony Stark will do anything to help him remember, but he won’t even admit they are friends. (Teen, 13k).

Brave new world by @itsallavengers​, When Steve is defrosted early by Howard Stark, who dedicated his retirement to searching for Captain America, he’s feeling rather lost in the world that has moved on without him. But Howard is happy to help, he gives him a place to stay and a friendly face, and for that Steve is grateful. He also tells Steve that under no circumstances must he go near his son, Tony Stark. According to Howard, the man is a nasty piece of work. And really, it’s not like Howard would lie to him, right? Wrong. (Teen, 31k).

Have Your Cake and Eat It Too by @ilunabarrean, Tony comes awake to light kisses on his shoulder blades. He cracks one eye open. The lights are drawn down, but the holo-clock floating on his darkened window tells him it’s six in the morning. Steve smells damp and shower fresh as he leans over Tony’s back, and Tony angles his head for a soft drowsy kiss. Steve must have gone on one of his ridiculous four am jogs. Apparently rolling around in bed for an hour the previous night had done nothing to cut into his exercise time. Tony sighs, mumbling sleepily as he’s turned from his side onto his stomach. Broad hands work down his flanks, strong thumbs press into the dip of his spine, working out tension and soreness. (Explicit, 3k).

I’ll Be (Good To You) by @ishipallthings, Steve Rogers wakes up seventy years out of time to a new world and a soulmate. It’s an adjustment. What he doesn’t expect is Tony Stark, a brilliant futurist who is equal parts fascinating and frustrating, and has just as many demons as Steve. He also doesn’t expect to find a family with a ragtag team of superheroes, or to fall in love. Luckily, Steve is nothing if not adaptable. (Teen, 15k).

Not that pretty by @s-horne​, “Pretty.” Peter tapped the arc reactor in Tony’s chest with a clumsy hand and Tony smiled. It wasn’t pretty by any means, but the light was a cool colour at least. And it worked as a damn good nightlight for the kid too. In the two years that they’d had Peter, it had been their most effective tool for getting the little boy to sleep. Peter’s eyes were already closing and his head dropped onto Tony’s chest. He stroked over the light again as he spoke, speech soft and slurred with sleep. “I want one.” […] (General, 1k).

Pillar by @darkjan, They find James Barnes in the summer of 1977. Tony Stark is seven years old and impossibly smart, and it doesn’t occur to James to measure time in any other way than in relation to Tony because, let’s face it, Tony is one of the pillars upon which he rebuilt himself. (General, 7k).

blog.name: sockdreams
blog.title: Sock Dreams
blog.description: www.sockdreams.com | we make your sock dreams come true

tags: this week has been a lot
summary: New Marvel Socks from Stance We got these socks a couple weeks ago, of course, to get pictures taken and entries made on our...
caption:
New Marvel Socks from Stance

We got these socks a couple weeks ago, of course, to get pictures taken and entries made on our website. And now…releasing them feels a little bitter sweet, with the news of Stan Lee’s passing this last week. He was a hero and icon to many, and I know a lot of comics fans are feeling a little hollow right now. Obviously socks aren’t going to fix that. But these can be a fun way of remembering him.

Do you have a favorite Stan Lee creation? I’m kind of a sucker for Iron Man, myself…I just love a reformed jerk trying to do his best.

♥Lucy
Socks by Sock Dreams • Free Shipping in the US • $5 International Shipping
Find us on facebook | twitter | pinterest | instagram | sock journal | g+

blog.name: grumpyjohn
blog.description: If you can‘t hide it, you might as well embrace it.

tags: this was my first Project on photoshop lol
the ferry incident was as much tony's fault as peter's imho
summary:
canigetafuckmeupfam
 replied to your post  “Look Tony, you can hardly tell Peter off for getting himself involved...”
          ...
body:
canigetafuckmeupfam replied to your post “Look Tony, you can hardly tell Peter off for getting himself involved…”
Not to be rude, but Tony did listen to him and got the FBI involved. Now, should Tony have told Peter that he did something instead of leading him to believe nothing was being done, yes. But Tony did listen to Peter.

I posted that after Tony fished Peter from the river (before the ferry incident), when they weren’t listening to him at all.  But I agree with you that Tony definitely should have told him he was doing something!

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary:
Tony coming home at 2 in the morning,  drunk: *runs into the couch and hits his small toe* FUCK 
Stephen from the Bedroom: QUITE...
body:
Tony coming home at 2 in the morning, drunk: *runs into the couch and hits his small toe* FUCK

Stephen from the Bedroom: QUITE ASSHOLE, I NEED TO GET UP EARLY TOMORROW!

Tony lying on the floor: STEPHEN I’M DYING

Stephen: DO IT QUITE

title: The Lies of a Trickster
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QN3nJP

by Safire_Sentry

What happens when the God of Mischief has had a longing for the God of Thunder? When a extreme change happens that affects both of their lives, will Loki be able to tell Thor his feels, and better yet, accept them within himself?

Words: 372, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Thor (Movies)

  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The MARVEL-ous Games
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Kaj3nY

by disappointedattheworld

Hunger games au (hence the major character death warnings)

Told through the Galaxy’s (Capitol’s) point of view:

“Ooh, Quill, it appears that the Red Skull has run into a situation in which his Asset isn’t useful…”

“Don’t worry too much, Trash Panda. Hunger is for the weak!”

“Oh. I kind of expected you to say that Mr. Skull could just eat Mr. Soldier”

“What the fuck? What kind of a sick person would do that?”

“Desperate times, desperate measures”

“Well said, Raccoon”

“Don’t call me a raccoon!”

Words: , Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of The MARVEL-ous Games

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Characters: Johann Schmidt, James “Bucky” Barnes, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Susan Storm (Fantastic Four), Johnny Storm, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Hope Van Dyne, Scott Lang, Pietro Maximoff, Wanda Maximoff, Wade Wilson, Gamora (Marvel), Nebula (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Matt Murdock, Peter Parker, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Peter Quill, Rocket Raccoon, T'Challa (Marvel), M'Baku (Marvel), Neena Thurman
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Hunger Games Setting


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Kaj3nY

blog.name: laufeysan
blog.title: su
blog.description: incorrect context of marvel- or should I say ironstrange and loki

summary:
Stephen: *is crouching over in pain*
Tony: What happened?
Stephen: Nothing...
Tony: Stephen! Why are you hurt?
Stephen: Anthony...
body:
Stephen: *is crouching over in pain*

Tony: What happened?

Stephen: Nothing…

Tony: Stephen! Why are you hurt?

Stephen: Anthony please, it’s not a big deal

Tony: I promise I’ll stay calm. Just tell me who hurt you

Stephen: I just stubbed my toe against the table-

Tony: *holding a chainsaw* WHICH TABLE?!
